About Me Projects

My Story

I am full time employee at CRRC MA corporation and a part-time Master student majoring Computer Sciences on both computing system and machine learning tracks at Georgia Tech. I am interested in exploring the fields of Software Engineering, Data Science, and Machine Learning, and I am open to any opportunities to hone my relative skills.

Featured Projects

Job Search Tracker

       

Introducing Job Application Tracker, a job board application designed to streamline job application tracking, leveraging the power of the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. Authentication and authorization are seamlessly managed through JWT (JSON Web Tokens), ensuring secure token-based registration and sign-in processes. The use of MongoDB, hosted in the cloud via Atlas, optimizes data management efficiency.

Go to the Project

CPT CMS

   

Introducing the Student CPT Application Management System, a comprehensive solution that streamlined the Curricular Practical Training (CPT) application process for international students, particularly during the challenging pandemic period. Leveraging an intuitive Learning Management System (LMS) approach, the web application was meticulously crafted using Scala and Play Framework. Implementing the MVC pattern accelerated testing protocols, ensuring robustness and reliability. Data integrity and accessibility were achieved by MongoDB guaranteeing high-speed access to the online portal for all users.

Go to the Project

Groupon E-Commerce Website

       

This project focused on developing an e-commerce website for local wholesale merchant, leveraging ReactJS and Bootstrap for front-end and RESTful APIs and Spring Boot for back-end, guaranteeing secure and efficient services for user authentication, product catalog management, and order processing. Database management utilized Spring Data JPA repositories with MySQL, enabling efficient data storage and retrieval. Finally, the application was deployed on AWS EC2 instances, ensuring scalability and reliability for Groupon's e-commerce operations.

Go to the Project

Tally Application

 

This is a comprehensive solution designed to streamline monthly expenses on mobile devices. With a focus on user-friendly interface design, the app incorporates custom pop-up pages, icons, and buttons, enhancing usability and navigation, along with a customized user keyboard. Additionally, the app offers data visualization capabilities through the integration of the MPAndroidChart library, enabling users to analyze and interpret data effortlessly with interactive bar charts.

Go to the Project
